meanings.sent1: The roughnecking at the construction site was loud and energetic.
meanings.sent2: I heard some roughnecking coming from the garage next door.
meanings.sent3: The children's roughnecking in the playground made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The roughnecking of the waves against the shore was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The roughnecking of the engine signaled a problem.

meanings.sent1: His roughnecking of the heavy machinery impressed the supervisor.
meanings.sent2: The roughnecking of the ropes required strength and skill.
meanings.sent3: The cat's roughnecking of the yarn left a mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: Her roughnecking of the guitar strings produced a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The roughnecking of the branches in the wind created a rustling sound.
